    PrintableExecution

    public class ImageFileReading
extends ImageFileExecutionStep
    Class that deals with reading images from the local file system.

        public void printProcessingTime()

      • execute

        public void execute()
        This method opens the file at the given path filePath or uses the given file and tries to read an image into the BufferedImage image. The input file must have the extension bmp, otherwise this will fail.
        Specified by:
        execute in class ExecutionStep
